description: A sequential, multi-model AI methodology for extracting design styles from visual inspiration and generating comprehensive, machine-readable design system documentation through three specialized prompts with model switching and context management
discovered: Video_009 (Chris Ashby - 3 Prompts To Get INCREDIBLE App Designs From AI)
unique_characteristics: Sequential prompts with progressive detail (high-level → implementation → comprehensive)
Model specialization (GPT-5 for analysis/docs, Claude/Sonnet for code)
Context management (new agent/chat for each prompt)
Abstraction level control (avoid overfitting in early stages)

stage_1.name: Visual Design Analysis
stage_1.purpose: Extract high-level design principles from visual inspiration
stage_1.model_rationale: Superior for visual interpretation and design language extraction
stage_1.processing: AI analyzes visual elements and extracts design principles at high level
stage_1.key_insight: Stay high-level to let AI fill gaps intelligently without overfitting to screenshot specifics

stage_2.name: Component Implementation
stage_2.purpose: Generate working application demonstrating all UI components
stage_2.model_rationale: Superior for structured code generation and component architecture
stage_2.processing: AI translates design.json into complete web application with all components
stage_2.output: UI Component Showcase App (Vite + React + Tailwind CSS)
output_contents: All standard UI components (buttons, cards, forms, etc.)
stage_2.key_insight: Model switch to Claude/Sonnet for better code generation; new context for focused implementation

stage_3.name: Comprehensive Documentation
stage_3.purpose: Create detailed, AI-consumable design system specification
stage_3.model_rationale: Superior for comprehensive documentation and detailed specification writing
input_source: Complete showcase app code from Stage 2
stage_3.processing: AI synthesizes all information into ultra-detailed design system guide
output_contents: All component definitions with complete specs
stage_3.context_strategy: NEW agent/chat required (fresh perspective for documentation)
stage_3.key_insight: Switch back to GPT-5 for documentation strength; comprehensive detail level prevents ambiguity

context_management_strategy.principle: Clear context between stages for focused output
context_management_strategy.implementation: Create new agent/chat in Cursor for each stage
context_management_strategy.rationale: Prevents AI confusion from mixing visual analysis, code generation, and documentation tasks
context_management_strategy.benefit: Each stage gets focused, specialized output without interference from previous stages

progressive_detail_strategy.rationale: Progressive detail prevents overfitting early while ensuring completeness later
progressive_detail_strategy.benefit: Stage 1 stays flexible for AI interpretation; Stage 3 leaves no ambiguity

success_factors.description: Use clean, flat design system screenshots without decorative elements
success_factors.impact: High - determines accuracy of Stage 1 extraction

success_factors.description: Use correct AI model for each stage's task type
success_factors.impact: High - affects quality of code vs. documentation
Medium - prevents confusion but takes extra setup time

success_factors.description: Vite + React + Tailwind is AI-friendly and widely supported
success_factors.impact: Medium - ensures compatibility with Lovable, Bolt, Cursor

success_factors.description: Refine Stage 2 output before Stage 3 if needed
success_factors.impact: Low - nice to have but not required

business_value.problem_solved: AI coding tools generating generic, inconsistent 'purple gradient' designs
business_value.solution: Comprehensive, AI-readable design system ensures consistent, high-quality output
business_value.scalability: One design system guides unlimited AI-generated features
business_value.roi: One-time setup, unlimited reuse; prevents redesign cycles

direct_applications: Any design system extraction from inspiration images
Brand style guide generation from examples
adapted_applications: Logo design extraction and variation generation
UI refactoring for consistency across existing apps
methodology_patterns: Model specialization for different cognitive tasks
Context management for complex multi-stage workflows
Progressive detail from abstract to specific

lovable.benefit: Automatic design adherence in all features

simple_screenshot_copy.approach: Drop screenshot into AI, ask to copy
problems: AI generalizes and fills gaps incorrectly

limitations: Requires subscription to Cursor and AI models
Limited by quality of source inspiration
Best for web applications (mobile requires adaptation)
Tailwind CSS specific (other frameworks need manual translation)
considerations: Source screenshot quality critical for success
Learning curve for model specialization understanding

stage_4_possibility.name: Automated Feature Generation
stage_4_possibility.description: Use design-system.json to auto-generate specific features
stage_4_possibility.example: Prompt: 'Build a user profile page following @design-system.json'
stage_4_possibility.benefit: Direct application of design system to new features

stage_0_possibility.name: Automated Inspiration Curation
stage_0_possibility.description: AI searches Dribbble and curates design system options
stage_0_possibility.example: Prompt: 'Find 5 blue-themed SaaS design systems on Dribbble'

multi_design_system.name: Design System Variants
multi_design_system.description: Generate multiple design systems from same source
multi_design_system.example: Dark mode variant, mobile variant, high-contrast variant
